page.title: 18 Gymnastics in Cwmbran
page.content: Cwnbran has a very enthusiastic gymnastics following. There are three main gym clubs, South Gwent, Cwmbran and Llantarnam, all of which have a large number of children as members. Each of the clubs are fortunate to have excellent facilities and many of the children are entered for various competitions,as individuals and as team members. My Gymnastics Club __________________by Sian Taylor. On a Monday at 6.00pm I go to the Stadium to train for gymnastics. We warm up for half an hour then we move onto the apparatus. We go on the floor first then we move on to the bars etc. At 8.00pm we pack up, some of us go into the cafeteria for a drink or for something to eat. When it is time to go home we think"That was two hours well spent".
